name: Hall of Monsters
description:
Enter chaotic battles with patrolling monsters, collect treasure and escape!

  • Shoot fireballs at monsters using magic
  • Collect potions to restore your magic
  • Collect food, which helps restore your health

Find the key and return to the exit door to the right of the level.

Gamepad supported and recommended.

Made for Mini Jam 100: Overload

Follow me on Twitter
